text: Ville Salmikivi (born 20 May 1992 in Helsinki) is a Finnish footballer who plays as a forward for Finnish Veikkausliiga club FC Lahti. ==Career== ===Youth career=== Salmikivi begun playing football being five years old in HIFK. The youth organisation of HIFK was acquired by PK-35 in 2000, thus he played in PK-35 until the season 2010.http://www.mypa.fi/uutiset/edustusjoukkue/?uutinen=342 He was selected as "The Boy Player of the Year" of the club in 2008.http://www.pk-35.fi/index.php/pk-35-helsinki/hall-of-fame/vuosien- palkitut ===Viikingit=== Salmikivi didn't manage to break through to the first team of PK-35, therefore he moved to FC Viikingit for the season of 2011. In Viikingit he was the top goalscorer of the season 2011 in Ykkönen, scoring 20 goals. The accomplishment earned himself to be "The Footballer of the Season 2011 in Ykkönen", voted by the Federation of Finnish Footballers. During the season 2012, he scored seven times.http://www.palloliitto.fi/uutiset/miesten- ykkonen/salmikivi-ja-pyharanta-viikingeista-mypaan ===MyPa=== For the season 2013, he transferred to MyPa.http://www.palloliitto.fi/uutiset/miesten- ykkonen/salmikivi-ja-pyharanta-viikingeista-mypaan He made his league debut on 14 May 2013 in the opening match against KuPS.http://www.veikkausliiga.com/Match.aspx?id=1302441 He continued to play for MyPa in 2014. ===HIFK=== For the season 2015, he made a contract with HIFK.http://www.veikkausliiga.com/News.aspx?id=57830 ===Beroe=== On 3 February 2017 Salmikivi joined Beroe Stara Zagora of the Bulgarian First League.Виле Салмикиви е играч на „Берое“ He made his debut in the league on February 17, scoring one goal for the 4-0 thrashing over Dunav Ruse at home.Летящ старт за Берое, заралии с тежък погром над Дунав He left Beroe on 9 June 2017. ===Olimpia Grudziądz=== On 13 July 2017, Salmikivi signed with I liga side Olimpia Grudziądz. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Helsinki Category:Finnish footballers Category:Finland youth international footballers Category:Finland under-21 international footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Veikkausliiga players Category:PK-35 Vantaa players Category:FC Viikingit players Category:FC Lahti players Category:Myllykosken Pallo −47 players Category:HIFK Fotboll players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:PFC Beroe Stara Zagora players Category:I liga players Category:Olimpia Grudziądz players Category:Finnish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Bulgaria Category:Finnish expatriate sportspeople in Poland Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:Sudet players
title: Ville Salmikivi
